stories.original_headline: A Christmas tree 80 light-years wide appears in space
stories.original_summary: This Christmas, astronomers are highlighting a spectacular region of space that looks remarkably like a glowing holiday tree. stories.fantasy_headline: Stargazers Behold a Colossal Yule Tree in the Celestial Expanse
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Order of Stargazers recently unveiled a wondrous sight in the celestial realm. A vast, glowing form resembling a Yule tree has appeared among the distant sky-gems. This magical vision is made of nascent stars illuminating clouds of cosmic dust, a true spectacle for all.

stories.original_headline: I re-created Google’s cute Gemini ad with my own kid’s stuffie, and I wish I hadn’t
stories.original_summary: When your kid starts showing a preference for one of their stuffed animals, you're supposed to buy a backup in case it goes missing. stories.fantasy_headline: A Parent's Magical Regret: No Twin for the Beloved Plush Deer
stories.fantasy_story: A local artisan attempted to recreate a popular illusion from the Wizards' Guild, featuring a child and their magical plush deer. However, the tale served as a stark reminder. When a child's heart chooses a comfort familiar, it is wise to consult the Replication Enchanters for a twin, lest sorrow befall the household if the original vanishes.

stories.original_headline: Hollywood cozied up to AI in 2025 and had nothing good to show for it
stories.original_summary: AI isn't new to Hollywood - but this was the year when it really made its presence felt. stories.fantasy_headline: Bardic Guild's Artifice-Magic Experiments Yield No Grand Tales
stories.fantasy_story: This past year, the Grand Theatre Guild embraced the use of artifice-magic and enchanted automatons in their grand productions. While these arcane aids promised wonders, from age-reversing glamour spells to banishing verdant veils, the resulting shows were not met with the expected applause. It seems true magic still needs the touch of a living bard.
